sentence: Thursday's session closes with the NASDAQ Composite Index at 7,070.33.
The total shares traded for the NASDAQ was over 2.07 billion.
Declining stocks led advancers by 2.84 to 1 ratio.
There were 819 advancers and 2327 decliners for the day.
On the NASDAQ Stock Exchange 5 stocks reached a 52 week high and 237 those reaching lows totaled.
The most active, advancers, decliners, unusual volume and most active by dollar volume can be monitored intraday on the Most Active Stocks page.
The NASDAQ 100 index closed up .06% for the day; a total of 4.01 points.
MercadoLibre, Inc. ( MELI ) had the largest percent change down (-7.71%) while JD.com, Inc. ( JD ) had the largest percent change gain rising 3.75%.
The Dow Jones index closed up .29% for the day; a total of 70.11 points.
Nike, Inc. ( NKE ) had the largest percent change down (-1.87%) while Procter & Gamble Company (The) ( PG ) had the largest percent change gain rising 2.62%.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
